description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 12/06/2006

Taylor tells Ridge, Thorne and Felicia about their mother’s tumultuous past. Felicia argues with Taylor that it can’t be true but begins to believe what she is saying about Stephanie’s revelations.  As Stephanie confronts Ann, Pamela admits that she realized what went on during their childhood (that Stephanie’s father abused her) even though she didn’t fully understand it. Stephanie asks Ann why she left her alone to deal with her father’s rage; why she knew but did nothing to stop it.
